content.rendered:
We are making here Pos Foldable stands

Pallets Display stands

Stable Pallet display, equipped with a slatwall for hangers. For a safe transport the products are packed in tailor made cardboard boxes.

 
 

Counter Display stands

High-quality Pos display for product presentation, with attached topcard.

 
 

Shelf Display Stands

Stable Shelf display with 4 variable shelves. Suitable for heavy goods. The display can be used as a floor display or on a 1/4 pallet.

Standard Display Stands

Stable Display Socle with high weight capacity. Flexible use with one or 2 trays and with or without the topcard.

17 years of experience helping people for best solutions

Learn More About Our Missions

 

We create bespoke retail displays that engage customers and increase your sales. spot display specialises in design and production of promotional displays made of cardboard, offering you a wide range of custom POS solutions and high quality Standard displays. Do you need a creative Life-size display stand to promote your brand? A large shop-in-shop concept for a new product line? Or do you prefer a small solution, for example a Counter Display? We can help you advertise your product in the most effective way!

READ MORE

Our recent Designs&

some examples of

pastProjects

Our tech prowess is ably matched by our design and fabrication  capabilities. Our team is constantly watchful of retail advancements and innovations, so we can take on the latest tech and fabrication design needs . The line-up shown is not exhaustive but is a mere round-up of our deeper capabilities – of man, machinery and ingenuity ,ensuring stunning results and delighted customers.

WeLoveWhat

We Do

 

Spot has been successfully operating on the market since 1993. We are constantly expanding our services, technical equipment and machinery by adapting an innovative corporate strategy. We are specialists for displays and packaging made of Cardboard and offer a full-range service under one roof and at the highest technical level.

With Live Chat
